name: dust2jsx
description: Create JSX code from Dust template

scripts.shrink: echo 'Remove node modules' && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f npm-shrinkwrap.json && echo 'Reinstall modules' && npm install . && echo 'Shrinkwrap' && npm shrinkwrap --dev
scripts.test:watch: nodemon --ext js,json,html,jsx --watch src --watch test --exec 'npm run test'
